title: #6: Making a Murderer: Microscopic Look at Colborn and Sturm Phone Calls
description:
In the 6th installment of our "Making a Murderer" discussion, Jim Clemente, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti pick apart the Pam Sturm and Andrew Colborn phone calls.
